After surviving trials that would have destroyed a mere mortal, Goku now faces the most dangerous journey of his entire life. Evil forces have conspired to scatter the Dragon Balls to the far corners of the universe, and the atmosphere is dense with danger. Unless the heroic Saiyan can recover all seven magic orbs within a year, Earth will meet a catastrophic end!

But even if Goku is successful on his mission of mercy, threats remain that must be dealt with swiftly. Two evil geniuses have created the perfect killing machine; Android 17. While this mechanical abomination deals out death, terrifying villains from battles past rise up to wreak havoc on humanity, and cracks in the Dragon Balls give birth to the fury of seven Shadow Dragons! Goku is the only warrior alive with the strength to defeat these new evils, but one false step from the mighty Saiyan could spell doom for the world! 

*****This torrent includes ALL episodes, promos, specials, bonuses and trailers off the DVDs of the set. It also includes the MARATHON episodes, which is basically all the episodes fom a DVD edited as a run-on episode, without openings or endings for each episode, except the begining and actual ending of the DVD.
  Doing torrents, I have had my experiences with retards leaving comments regarding the inclusion of extras - complaining, bitching and putting down the torrent because of the 'extra' size and content, though these idiots seem to have no idea on how to use their bit client to choose what they want to download out of a torrent.
They seem to think I work for them only without realizing that I dont work for them, but that I do this with the thought and care for people like me, who want and appreciate the extras off a DVDBD.*****

Includes:

English language Episodes (no subs), Single episodes and 'Marathon' episodes
Japanese language episodes with English subtitles burned in (embedded), Single episodes and 'Marathon' episodes
Bonus tracks and videos, promos and trailers in English only
